title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; install via npm i ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: llama-index-integrations/llama-index-llms-ollama
summary: LlamaIndex LLM and embeddings connector for Ollama; RAG pipelines in two lines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed Open WebUI); runs in Docker.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenience CLI wrapper for chat, model management, and prompt templating.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models inline as GitHub-Copilot replacements.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama with fluent API; Maven Central artifact net.ollama4j.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that connects to local Ollama; showcases streaming responses.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers users via any Ollama model.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI pipelines that need to spin up Ollama containers and run prompts.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, vision, embeddings, fine-tuning, and more.

title: ollama-model-registry
summary: Official Modelfile library—Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, Gemma, etc.—with pull commands.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module wrapping the Ollama JS client for enterprise backends.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI that streams Ollama responses and supports file Q&A via LlamaIndex.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for offline AI autocomplete and note summarization using Ollama.
